column1: I've posted details on this topic over at Virgin Islands On-Line, here:virgin-islands-on-line.com/virgin-islands/â€¦All the best,Kevin

The epidemic has passed as expected but visitors shouldn't assume that they can therefore let up on the use of Deet-containing insect repellents. Dengue, chikungunya and Zika remain to be aware of even after epidemic status has passed by so continue to protect yourselves diligently!
